main event: A UFO was observed at Larson AFB on 2 November 1964, showing a zig-zag course with buzzing sounds.
interesting points: The object was described as having the shape of an upside-down dipper and approximately 3 lights emitting a buzzing sound., The sighting was confirmed through ground-radar observation., The duration of the observation was less than one minute., The conclusions suggested the object might have been a balloon or an aircraft due to insufficient data., Observers noted that the object covered several miles in a short time before disappearing.
sighted object: object resembling an upside-down dipper with lights
witness description: individual identified as a welding mechanic
